extendedInfo.description: Saint Valentine's Day, commonly shortened to Valentine's Day, is an annual commemoration held on February 14 celebrating love and affection between intimate companions. The day is named after one or more early Christian martyrs, Saint Valentine, and was established by Pope Gelasius I in 496 AD. Learn more about this lovely holiday.kw: love, dating, valentine, marriage, relationship, couples, romance, romantic quotes, love quotes.
